Method Detail

report

java.lang.String report(int details)
Report about the device. This should be called without owning the port even though some report results may be bad. It can cause unnecessary delays if it is called with the port locked.

Parameters:
details - How much detail.
Returns:
A String containing the report.

getInterfaces

Interface[] getInterfaces()
Get an array of the device interfaces. This can be called without owning the port.

Returns:
The array of interfaces.

getDeviceName

java.lang.String getDeviceName()
Get the deviceName.

Returns:
The name.

getFullName

java.lang.String getFullName()
Get the name of the port and device, which has the format portName[deviceName].

Returns:
The name.

getPort

Port getPort()
Get the port for this device.

Returns:
The Port interface.

getTrace

Trace getTrace()
Get the interface for tracing.

Returns:
The Trace interface.

enable

void enable(boolean trueFalse)
Enable or disable a device. If a device is disabled than any active request will complete at an unknown time in the future.

Parameters:
trueFalse - (false,true) means to (disable,enable) the device.

autoConnect

void autoConnect(boolean trueFalse)
Set the autoConnect state for the device.

Parameters:
trueFalse - The autoConnect state.

isConnected

boolean isConnected()
Is the device connected to it's I/O.

Returns:
(false,true) if it (is not, is) connected.

isEnabled

boolean isEnabled()
Is the device enabled. If not enabled then requests for the device fail.

Returns:
(false,true) if it (is not, is) enabled.

isAutoConnect

boolean isAutoConnect()
Will an automatic connect request be made when the first request for the device is issued.

Returns:
(false,true) if an attempt to connect (will not, will) made when a queueRequest is active and the device is not connected.

exceptionListenerAdd

Status exceptionListenerAdd(User user,
                            ConnectExceptionListener connectExceptionListener)
Add a listener for connect/disconnect events. This can be called without owning the port.

Parameters:
user - The user.
connectExceptionListener - The listener interface.
Returns:
Status.success means that the attempt was successful. If the attempt fails user.getMessage() describes why the request failed.

exceptionListenerRemove

void exceptionListenerRemove(User user)
Remove a listener for connect/disconnect events. This can be called without owning the port.

Parameters:
user - The user.

findInterface

Interface findInterface(User user,
                        java.lang.String interfaceName)
Find an interface.

Parameters:
user - The user.
interfaceName - The name of the interface. If true then User.findInterface is called first.
Returns:
The Interface or null if the interface is not registered.

connect

Status connect(User user)
Attempt to connect. This must be called with the port owned by the user.

Parameters:
user - The requester.
Returns:
Status.success means that the attempt was successful. If the attempt fails user.getMessage describes why the request failed.

disconnect

Status disconnect(User user)
Attempt to disconnect. This must be called with the port owned by the user.

Parameters:
user - The requester.
Returns:
Status.success means that the attempt was successful. If the attempt fails user.getMessage describes why the request failed.

blockOtherUsers

Status blockOtherUsers(User user)
Block all other users from accessing the device. Must be called with the port owned by the caller.

Parameters:
user - The user that is making the block request.
Returns:
The status of the request.

unblockOtherUsers

void unblockOtherUsers(User user)
Allow other users to again use the device. Must be called with the port owned by the caller.

Parameters:
user - The user that called blockOtherUsers.

isBlockedByOtherUser

boolean isBlockedByOtherUser(User user)
Is the device blocked by someone other than the caller. Must be called with the port owned by the caller.

Parameters:
user - The user.
Returns:
(false,true) if the device (is not, is) blocked.

registerInterface

void registerInterface(Interface iface)
Register an interface for accessing the device. Called by deviceDriver to register an interface. This must be called with the port locked.

Parameters:
iface - The Interface.

exceptionConnect

void exceptionConnect()
A connect exception. This is called by the deviceDriver. This must be called with no locks held and without owning the port.

exceptionDisconnect

void exceptionDisconnect()
A disconnect exception.This is called by the deviceDriver. This must be called with no locks held and without owning the port.
